title: Agile Team-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Innovative Competencies in Surgical Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Flexible learning structures for surgical residents with demanding clinical schedules, emphasizing team-based collaboration and practicality.

learning_goals: Learners can generate and prototype innovative ideas for solving clinical problems at least three times
Learners can complete at least one innovative project within 8 weeks using team-based agile methodologies
Learners can apply core concepts essential for medical innovation (e.g., design thinking, risk management) to real-world cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
